General.Name: Polylite Taiwan Co Ltd
General.Description: Polylite Taiwan Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes GIA polycarbonate lenses worldwide. Its products include FSV, SFSV, progressive, KID, and polarized lenses. The company also offers dispending, fitting, and edging and finishing services. Polylite Taiwan Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 406, Changfa Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33759
